en: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are two springs, flowing.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ
en: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade,
and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
